div.p: If you had 1 million euros, what would you do with it?
If one day I win 1 million euros, I would like to discover the world. Travelling everywhere around our planet from big cities like New York and Tokyo to small ilands to discover the natur.

In addition to that, I would like to help populations who live far from us, I will discover unknow towns where I could meet and help them to built schools or other things after an accident like a tsunami or something else. If I have enough money, I can spare it for the research. Later, I would like to find and create new tectonolgies for a better futur, to help our beautiful planet.
